markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)

- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If youâ€™re an iPhone user, you may see this if your iOS version is iOS 13 and below. To log in to GCash, make sure your operating system is updated to at least iOS 14 and newer. Learn more about this advisory [here](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/26245453156633-Advisory-for-using-GCash-on-iPhone-with-iOS-13-and-Below).

If your iOS version is updated, or if youâ€™re an Android user and youâ€™re seeing this error, please try to [troubleshoot the GCash app](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38910877046937-How-to-troubleshoot-GCash-app-issues).

If your GCash app keeps crashing, [please click here to ask for help](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=i_can_t_log_in_to_my_gcash_app&tf_18766009076633=the_app_is_not_opening_or_it_is_crashing). A customer service representative will contact you within **24 hours**.

### Need more Help?
